content.title: Launch the App
content.body:
1. Enter the following login credentials in your app.
    • Username: john.doe@woodburn.com
    • Password: VoltMX@123
  2. Click Login.
    The account list appears.
  3. Click the Recipients tab.
    The recipient list appears.
  4. Click the add (+) icon to add a recipient.
  5. Select a recipient from the list to view their details.
  6. From the Details page, click the Delete button to delete the recipient.
  7. From the Details page, click the Edit button to edit the recipient details.
  8. Click the Logout button on top of the screen to navigate to the login screen.
